member.name: T:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.LicenseInformation
member.summary: Provides access to the current app's license metadata

member.name: M:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.LicenseInformation.#ctor(Windows.ApplicationModel.Store.LicenseInformation)
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: M:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.LicenseInformation.ToString
member.summary: Override

member.name: P:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.LicenseInformation.expirationDate
member.summary: Gets the license expiration date and time relative to the system clock

member.name: P:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.LicenseInformation.isActive
member.summary: Gets the value that indicates whether the license is active

member.name: P:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.LicenseInformation.isTrial
member.summary: Gets the value that indicates whether the license is a trial license

member.name: P:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.LicenseInformation.productLicenses
member.summary: Gets the associative list of licenses for the app's features that can be bought through an in-app purchase

member.name: T:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.ListingInformation
member.summary: Provides the listing info that describes the app in the Windows Store.

member.name: M:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.ListingInformation.#ctor(Windows.ApplicationModel.Store.ListingInformation)
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: M:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.ListingInformation.ToString
member.summary: Override

member.name: P:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.ListingInformation.description
member.summary: Gets the app's description in the current market.

member.name: P:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.ListingInformation.formattedPrice
member.summary: Gets the app's purchase price formatted for the current market and currency.

member.name: P:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.ListingInformation.name
member.summary: Gets the app's name in the current market.

member.name: P:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.ListingInformation.productListings
member.summary: Gets information about the features and products that can be bought by making in-app purchases.

member.name: T:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.ProductLicense
member.summary: Provides info about a license that is associated with an in-app offer

member.name: M:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.ProductLicense.#ctor(Windows.ApplicationModel.Store.ProductLicense)
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: M:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.ProductLicense.ToString
member.summary: Override

member.name: P:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.ProductLicense.expirationDate
member.summary: Gets the expiration date and time of the license

member.name: P:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.ProductLicense.isActive
member.summary: Gets the value that indicates whether the feature's license is active

member.name: P:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.ProductLicense.productId
member.summary: Gets the ID of an app's in-app offer

member.name: T:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.ProductType
member.summary: Specifies the product type for a product

member.name: F:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.ProductType.Unknown
member.summary: The product type is unknown

member.name: F:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.ProductType.Durable
member.summary: A durable product

member.name: F:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.ProductType.Consumable
member.summary: A consumable product

member.name: T:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.ProductListing
member.summary: Provides localized info about an in-app offer in your app.

member.name: M:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.ProductListing.#ctor(Windows.ApplicationModel.Store.ProductListing)
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: P:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.ProductListing.description
member.summary: Gets the product's description.

member.name: P:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.ProductListing.formattedPrice
member.summary: Gets the product's purchase price with the appropriate formatting for the current market.

member.name: P:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.ProductListing.name
member.summary: Gets the descriptive name of the product or feature that can be shown to customers in the current market.

member.name: P:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.ProductListing.productId
member.summary: Gets the ID of an app's feature or product.

member.name: P:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.ProductListing.productType
member.summary: Gets the type of this product. Possible values are defined by ProductType.

member.name: P:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.ProductListing.imageUrl
member.summary: Gets the product's image url.

member.name: P:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.ProductListing.tag
member.summary: Gets the tag string that contains custom information about this product.

member.name: M:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.Store.loadTestingLicenseXml(System.String)
member.summary: Calling this method puts the plugin in testing mode and no real purchases will occur. The XML passed in should have the format defined here

member.name: M:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.Store.loadListingInformation(System.Action{Prime31.WinPhoneStore.ListingInformation})
member.summary: Loads listing information and fires completionHandler with the data once loading completes

member.name: M:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.Store.getLicenseInformation
member.summary: Fetches the current LicenseInformation. If in testing mode it will be from the app simulator.

member.name: M:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.Store.showMarketplaceDetailPage
member.summary: Shows the Marketplace detail page used to convert a trial to a purchase. When this method is called on a non-published app it will show an error. If this error has the error code 805a0941, then the call was successful and will operate correctly when the app is published.

member.name: M:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.Store.clearCache
member.summary: Clears the application item cache when in test mode

member.name: M:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.Store.requestProductPurchase(System.String,System.Action{System.String,System.Exception})
member.summary: Requests a product purchase for the given productId. completionHandler will be called with either a receipt (string) or an error (Exception)

member.name: M:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.Store.reportProductFulfillment(System.String)
member.summary: Reports a product fulfillment to Microsoft. An item cannot be repurchased until it is reported as fulfilled. Note that only Consumable products can be fulfilled.

member.name: M:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.Store.getProductLicense(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a product license for the given productId. Returns null if no license exists for the product.

member.name: M:Prime31.WinPhoneStore.Store.getProductReceipt(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the product receipt for the given productId.

member.name: M:MockIAPLib.MockIAP.PopulateIAPItemsFromXml(System.String)
member.summary: Populates the Mock Library with IAP items defined in XML
